app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps DoTalk
app_description: The DoTalk app is your all in one communication companion making it fast easy and convenient to translate and communicate in over 90 languages. DoTalk multilingual platforms will help connect you with friends and business partners from all over the world and is a must have app for on all your amazing global travel adventures ahead. Simply log in or join for free to begin enjoying your DoTalk free features. Why else should I use the app You can send private messages in over 90 languages Send media and files Send voice messages Create group chats Make Calls Video Calls Search People Near Far DoTalk offers disappearing chats messages can only be read by its intended recipient Writing a Post in the News Feed that is instantly translated to your friends and followers Access to the DoTalk web version What are the Premium features Image to text translation On The Go Translation Create group chats with in using 10 different languages Video Calls with subtitle translation Access to the DoTalk web version DoTalk takes your privacy seriously and will never give any third parties access to your data. You can delete any message you ever sent or received for both sides at any time and without a trace. DoTalk will never use or sell your data. Download the DoTalk app now to have everything you need to communicate with anyone anywhere anytime! Our aim is to make DoTalk the Ultimate Multilingual Messenger with many more unique features planned in future updates! Terms and privacy policy: https: static.dotalk2.com static term policy
